p:
The 12 transcriptome and 12 small RNA libraries were quality checked with FASTQC tool ( https://www.bioinformatics.babraham.ac.uk/projects/fastqc/) and further trimmed with Trimmomatic tool
54 . For small RNAse libraries, only reads with length between 16-28 nucleotides were kept for posterior analysis. The high-quality transcriptome libraries were mapped separately on the Human genome (GRCH38.p12) from ENSEMBL databank ( http://www.ensembl.org/info/data/ftp/index.html) using the STAR mapper (Version 2.6)
55 , with default parameters. The small RNA reads were mapped in the human microRNA precursors retrieved from miRBase (Release 22) ( http://www.mirbase.org/) with Bowtie2 tool (version 2.2.1)
56 running with default parameters.
